alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 15 at 3:27PM MDT until July 15 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM MDT FOR YELLOWSTONE COUNTY... At 325 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles north of Shepherd to near Billings, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. 60 mph wind gusts were observed at the airport in Billings. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Tents and other temporary outdoor shelters could collapse. Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Billings, Laurel, Lockwood, Shepherd, Huntley, Billings Heights, Worden, Billings West End, Ballantine, Pompeys Pillar, Acton and Comanche. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
